name: Plan H - Organic High-Calorie Muscle Gainer

Breakfast.details: Organic Calorie-Dense Oatmeal: 1 cup organic steel-cut oats, 1 cup organic whole milk, 1 organic banana (mashed), 2 tbsp organic almond butter, 2 tbsp organic honey, 1 scoop organic vanilla protein powder, 1/4 cup organic chopped walnuts
Breakfast.instructions: Cook oats with milk. Stir in banana, almond butter, honey, and protein powder. Top with walnuts.

Mid-Morning Snack.details: Organic High-Calorie Smoothie: 2 scoops organic mass gainer protein powder, 1 cup organic whole milk, 1 organic banana, 1/2 cup organic oats, 2 tbsp organic peanut butter, 1/4 cup organic heavy cream

Lunch.details: Organic Bulking Burrito Bowl: 6 oz organic grass-fed ground beef, 1 cup cooked organic brown rice, 1/2 cup organic black beans, 1/2 organic avocado, 1/4 cup organic shredded cheese, 1/4 cup organic sour cream, 1/4 cup organic salsa
Lunch.instructions: Cook beef. Layer rice, beans, beef, and toppings in a bowl.

Pre-Workout Snack.details: Organic Calorie-Packed Trail Mix: 1/4 cup organic cashews, 1/4 cup organic almonds, 1/4 cup organic dried cranberries, 1/4 cup organic dark chocolate chips

Post-Workout Snack.details: Organic Muscle Recovery Shake: 2 scoops organic whey protein powder, 1 cup organic whole milk, 1 organic banana, 2 tbsp organic honey, 1/4 cup organic rolled oats, 2 tbsp organic heavy cream

Dinner.details: Organic Steak and Sweet Potato Mash: 8 oz organic ribeye steak, 1 large organic sweet potato, 1/4 cup organic whole milk, 2 tbsp organic butter, 1 cup organic steamed broccoli
Dinner.instructions: Grill steak. Mash sweet potato with milk and butter. Serve with steamed broccoli.

Evening Snack.details: Organic Peanut Butter Banana Sandwich: 2 slices organic whole grain bread, 2 tbsp organic peanut butter, 1 organic banana, 1 tbsp organic honey
Evening Snack.instructions: Spread peanut butter on bread, add sliced banana, drizzle with honey.
